alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:41PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butte and northern Lawrence Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 941 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Spearfish, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spearfish around 950 PM MDT. Saint Onge around 955 PM MDT. Whitewood around 1000 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include northwestern Sturgis and Apple Springs. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
